item.title: Weezer - You Might Think - Key of D - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song You Might Think by Weezer from the channel Andy Ramos. Chords used in the song: A, Bm, C, D, G.

item.title: Weezer - Say It Ain't So - Key of Eb - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Say It Ain't So by Weezer from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A♭, B♭, B♭maj7, Cm7, D♭, E♭, G.

item.title: Weezer - Island In The Sun - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Island In The Sun by Weezer from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A7, Am, C, D, Em, G.
